name: DeadManWalking
description:
---Controls---

-Look up-

W / left stick (up) / DPad (up)

-Look down-

S / left stick (down) / DPad (down)

-Move left-

D / left stick (left) / DPad (left)

-Move right-

A / left stick (right) / Dpad (right)

-Jump-

Space / A Button 

-Use Button-

E / X Button
